item.title: 10 Romantic Comedies From The '90s That Will Never Get Old
item.description: Despite being released decades ago, certain romantic comedies from the 1990s have the ability to be watched time and time again without getting old.

item.title: Before Rear Window, Alfred Hitchcock & James Stewart Made This Must-Watch Thriller Movie With 93% On RT
item.description: A 1948 Alfred Hitchcock thriller makes for the perfect viewing experience after watching 1954's Rear Window, which also stars James Stewart.

item.title: 10 Movies From The 2020s That Need Sequels
item.description: From movies that could easily turn into franchises to films that don't seem like they need a continuation, some great 2020s films deserve sequels.
